name: generate_qr_code
description: Generate QR code from text data with customizable size, border, and colors.

data.description: Text data to encode in QR code

size.description: Size of each QR code module in pixels (1-20)

border.description: Border size around QR code in modules (0-10)

fill_color.description: Color of QR code modules (hex color or color name)

back_color.description: Background color (hex color or color name)

output_path.description: Path for the output QR code image. If not provided, will create auto-named file.
